title: Systems Engineer
desc: Collaborated in a flat team to maintain and optimize a large-scale hosting platform serving millions of users worldwide
Enhanced performance and reliability of high-throughput system components
Built comprehensive CI/CD pipelines and automated testing suites for various system components
Implemented improvements and advanced meta-programming techniques across multiple high-impact projects

title: Software Developer
desc: Took part in a team to designed and develop a dedicated WordPress hosting platform
Set up and maintained version control, code hosting, and automated testing servers for the project
Developed and optimized core features in uWSGI, PHP, OpenResty, PostgreSQL
Designed and built scalable applications using Rust, Go, C, Lua, and JavaScript
Contributed to the architecture and implementation of a robust user management system

title: Software Developer
desc: Refactored, improved and extended a suite of AutoHotkey scripts to improve efficiency for a customer
Developed a JavaScript application that generated images from webcams or photos for a ad campaign

title: Systems Administrator
desc: Managed and a Linux-based infrastructure for hosting websites and file storage.
Contributed to minor graphical design work and supported website development with design implementation
